memberdef.name: GTEST_IMPL_CMP_HELPER_
memberdef.initializer: AssertionResult CmpHelper##op_name(const char* expr1, const char* expr2, \ BiggestInt val1, BiggestInt val2) {\ if (val1 op val2) {\ return AssertionSuccess();\ } else {\ return AssertionFailure() \ << "Expected: (" << expr1 << ") " #op " (" << expr2\ << "), actual: " << FormatForComparisonFailureMessage(val1, val2)\ << " vs " << FormatForComparisonFailureMessage(val2, val1);\ }\ }

memberdef.name: GTEST_REPEATER_METHOD_
GTEST_REVERSE_REPEATER_METHOD_
